reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Genéa Gaudet', 'Adam Hirsch'], 'Producers': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Christopher Poole', 'Bill Hayes', 'Jen Stocks', 'Kirk Streb', 'Mary Wilcher', 'Maggie Kay', 'Deanie Wilcher'], 'Studio': ['TLC']} After watching all the seasons of Sisterwives, I feel I have come to love them and all that they stand for. I am "mainstream" LDS. It is against our beliefs to live this type of life because it is against the law. BUT, I have such respect for the Brown family and all that they stand for. They are true to the faith. I could never condemn or otherwise harrass these beautiful people. I believe in religious freedom and think the government needs to stay out of these peoples lives. They have wonderful relationships though they do have dissagreements as would any family. Those children are soooo loved and they know it. Cody is a great Dad and husband and if only more men were like him, what a better world this would be. Each and every one of these wives are amazing, kind and loving individuals. They just want peace for their family. God bless you Brown family and hang in there. I believe there will come a time when you will be allowed to practice your religion with no fear.

I relate your situation to the persecution of the first LDS people in the early days of the restoration of the gospel. I would love to meet you one day as I'm sure I would grow as a person, just from being in the presence of each and everyone of your delightful spirits. Hugs and love from an LDS woman. Amazing way of life....in a good way {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Genéa Gaudet', 'Adam Hirsch'], 'Producers': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Christopher Poole', 'Bill Hayes', 'Jen Stocks', 'Kirk Streb', 'Mary Wilcher', 'Maggie Kay', 'Deanie Wilcher'], 'Studio': ['TLC']} I am hooked on this darn show. I love watching these guys. Great kids and great parents. I can't wait until they get those houses built. Great show Celebrity Wife Swap Unscripted ['Celebrity Wife Swap features the unlikeliest of moms swapping lives, including Splash contestant and Playmate Kendra Wilkinson and reality super mom Kate Gosselin of Kate Plus Eight fame.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Pamela Bower', 'Alex Cross', 'Bruce Toms', 'Jack Isacksen', 'Michael Davies', 'Tony Yates', 'Valerie Castillo', 'Ken Snow', 'Bailey Grizzle', 'Katie Bramble']} Loved it! Two different worlds collide and it was very interesting to watch them handle the challenges. Love Kate and Kendra! love Kendra Wilkenson and Kate Gosslin. What an interesting switch but I loved it. {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Chad Greulach', 'Steve Paley'], 'Producers': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Gene Simmons', 'Erin Kelly Richards', 'Natalie Gecht', 'Antonia Mattia', 'Matthew E. Fitzgerald'], 'Starring': ['Shannon Tweed', 'Nick Simmons', 'Sophie Simmons'], 'Studio': ['A&E Television Networks']} Someone once told me that when you have money nothing changes, theproblems just get bigger. The Simmons Tweed family are proof. VERY DOWN TO EARTH and fun loving people. Wonderful people {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kathryn Bigelow'], 'Producers': ['Colin Wilson', 'Greg Shapiro', 'Ted Schipper', 'Mark Boal', 'Kathryn Bigelow', 'Megan Ellison'], 'Starring': ['Jessica Chastain', 'Mark Strong', 'Joel Edgerton'], 'Studio': ['SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT', 'INC.']} Read the book and the film followed the book very well. Really enjoyed it. Great telling of a necessary event in history. great film {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Keith Truesdell', 'Anson Williams', 'Gail Bradley', 'Lindsley Parsons III', 'Jason Priestley', 'Ron Underwood', 'John Schneider', 'Barry Watson'], 'Producers': ['Lindsley Parsons III', 'Hrag Gaboudian', 'Elaine Arata'], 'Studio': ['Freeform']} This is not right, I am a prime member and should have gotten this for free, but it charged me. I want this refunded and I won't be doing this anymore. PERIOD! This is false advertising! I was charged $1.99 for this when it should have been free because I am a Prime member. What? {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Chad Greulach', 'Steve Paley'], 'Producers': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Gene Simmons', 'Erin Kelly Richards', 'Natalie Gecht', 'Antonia Mattia', 'Matthew E. Fitzgerald'], 'Starring': ['Shannon Tweed', 'Nick Simmons', 'Sophie Simmons']} Love this show. It does seem they are running out of steam though. Kinda struggling for content on the last two of the season. Best show ever {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jack Bender', 'Peter Leto', 'David Barrett', 'Sergio Mimica-Gezzan', 'Kari Skogland', 'Eriq La Salle', 'Edward Ornelas', 'Peter Weller', 'Roxann Dawson', 'Paul A. Edwards'], 'Starring': ['Mike Vogel', 'Rachelle Lefevre', 'Natalie Martinez'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Really enjoyed the pilot. Seems like it will be a great show, I'm excited to watch the rest. Good job. Great sow so far
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Religious Values:** The user identifies as "mainstream" LDS, advocating for religious freedom and the separation of church and state, reflecting an open-minded approach to differing beliefs.

- **Empathy & Support:** They exhibit compassion toward families of various beliefs, appreciating the bonds seen in familial relationships and admiring the qualities of children and parents.

- **Family Dynamics:** Values strong family connections and nurturing parental roles. Recent engagement with media showcasing down-to-earth families highlights their appreciation for authentic interactions and positive narratives, though they express concern over declining content quality in beloved shows.

- **Cultural Awareness:** Draws parallels between personal experiences and historical persecutions faced by LDS communities, showcasing a nuanced understanding of their faith's history and challenges.

- **Desire for Connection:** Shows a yearning for personal growth through interactions with diverse lifestyles, indicating a strong inclination toward community and shared experiences.

- **Positive Outlook:** Maintains an optimistic viewpoint on life, supported by uplifting family themes in media. Their recent enjoyment of a new show pilot demonstrates enthusiasm for well-crafted storytelling and a willingness to engage with entertainment that promises quality.

- **Media Consumption:** Appreciates narratives that reflect historical events while balancing entertainment with thought-provoking content. 

- **Consumer Behavior:** Recently expressed frustration over perceived injustices in media transactions, illustrating a strong expectation for service quality and transparency, as well as a willingness to advocate for consumer rights.

Overall, the user embodies compassion, understanding, and an open mindset toward diverse family structures and religious practices while maintaining vigilance in their consumer experiences.
